title: About QuizApp
text: QuizApp is a website that allows you to create and publish quizzes. It was created in 2024 by ErykNe, programmed in Visual Studio Code in Angular. It works offline for now. It is completely free and allows you to create quizzes without any restrictions or limitations. It is used by 1 satisfied users who wholeheartedly recommend this application for creating and publishing quizzes. If you want to access all quizzes created by other users, please register.
